Text:
Pay to watch a guy I can see for free? A guy who posts YT links to his shows online?

Lol... you're an idiot.

PS- Piracy is illegal, not socialism... socialism is an economical structure.

You're obviously a leftist, because no conservative would be that uninformed.

Big hello and Thank You!!! from a Canadian!

I found GB a few years ago in the swamps of florida, and then in my travels, found out I was more Texan than Canadian. In fact, I never was a Canadian. Even less so now!

Listen to his radio over Internet EVERY day! Post those shows to the other guy!!

This is important stuff!

Can't get this on my cable channel. (Surprise...)

Again. Many thanks.

Prepare for the future. 

Herkimer
